summary:
Detail-oriented Senior Compensation Analyst with experience in implementing new Rewards frameworks and launching Annual Merit Cycle processes in Workday. Passionate about designing compensation plans and strategies that increase business competitiveness.

Previous experience in other HR areas (Recruiting, Org. Design, HRIS).

Tech-savvy, proficient in Excel/Gsheet.
